definition: land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

sentences.english: The third part is countermeasures and suggestions to English education in kindergarten of Huhhot.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是呼和浩特市幼兒園英語教育對策及建議。

sentences.english: The petite nursery teacher has been coming to these events for months.
sentences.chinese: 這位纖秀的幼兒園老師幾個月來經常來這裏。

sentences.english: The thesis is a conclusion of the study, which is about kindergarteners professional identification.
sentences.chinese: 本文是關於幼兒園教師職業認同研究的結果。

sentences.english: Now the traditional custom is also celebrated in local kindergartens.
sentences.chinese: 現在，當地幼兒園也以這些傳統的習俗來慶祝。

sentences.english: Click to read the original, into the city of Kaifeng education system kindergarten micro website.
sentences.chinese: 點擊閱讀原文，進入開封市教育系統幼兒園微網站。

sentences.english: Attracted a large number of the second district of Jiaxing five backbone teachers to join.
sentences.chinese: 吸引了大批嘉興五縣二區幼兒園骨幹教師的加盟。

sentences.english: CLOU's first Kindergarten building received planning permission.
sentences.chinese: CLOU的第一座幼兒園建築已獲得規劃批准。

sentences.english: Which kindergarten your child is living in ?
sentences.chinese: 您孩子目前就讀於何所幼兒園？

sentences.english: Angelica tells the story of a friendship that began in kindergarten.
sentences.chinese: 安吉里卡講述了一個從幼兒園開始的友誼故事。

sentences.english: In the power of love, the gold into deep water static son kindergarten.
sentences.chinese: 在愛情的力量下，靜子把金深水帶入幼兒園。

sentences.english: Wisdom was not at the top of the graduate mountain, but there in the sandpile at nursery school.
sentences.chinese: 智慧不在研究生院的山巔之上，而在幼兒園的沙堆裏。

sentences.english: Before that days, the small remote village had never had high school and kindergarten.
sentences.chinese: 此前，這個偏遠小山村還辦過初中和幼兒園。

sentences.english: Yet there are even kindergartens and pre-schools that hold graduations.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，甚至幼兒園和學前班把持着畢業生。

sentences.english: The second part is Investigation and Analysis of English education in kindergarten of Huhhot.
sentences.chinese: 第二章是呼和浩特市幼兒園英語教育現狀調查分析。

sentences.english: Today, the majority of kindergarten children in China are only-children.
sentences.chinese: 今天中國幼兒園的大多數孩子都是獨生子女。

sentences.english: I brought the kindergarten, the kids seemed to have endless energy.
sentences.chinese: 我帶的是幼兒園中班，小傢伙們彷彿有無窮的精力。

definition: head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
to go to school/to attend school
elementary school (Tw)/abbr. for 國民小學|国民小学[guo2 min2 xiao3 xue2]
